SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi is a boy, a bit lazy in school and in his daily tasks. One day, fighting against his bullies classmates, Hiroshi accidentally fell over a frog who was jumping through Nerima, Tokyo Shakujii Park. Due to this incident, Pyonkichi, the frog, became a "flat frog" and his image and spirit get impregnated on Hiroshi's t-shirt. Due to this shirt being the only one that Hiroshi has kept in good shape, he is forced to wear it everyday, interacting with Pyonkichi and becoming friends. Pyonkichi has total control over the t-shirt, being able to move it at will, despite what Hiroshi may want.

1.TitleEnglish: The New Gutsy Frog The Movie
The Birth of "PYONKICHI" / Flat-frog's Life is Tough
1.SummaryEnglish: During a fight, Hiroshi trips and a Frog gets stuck on his shirt. The Frog introduces himself as Pyonkichi. / After Pyonkichi got stuck on a shirt, he is unable to go back to the world of frogs. But, he reunites with Pyonko.

2.TitleEnglish: Hiroshi's Date / Do you, Man, Cry for Sunglasses?
2.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi finally schedules a date with his crush, Kyoko. On the way to the date, he loses his voice. / Captivated by a lady passing by, Hiroshi is scolded by Kyoko. Hiroshi says he was just looking at sunglasses.

3.TitleEnglish: Goro's First Love / The Duel of Yuhigahara
3.SummaryEnglish: Goro falls in love with a girl called Misako. For this, Pyonkichi and Hiroshi have a big fight. / Gorilla-imo and Hiroshi promise to duel. But after hearing some rumors, Hiroshi is afraid.

4.TitleEnglish: Say, "AAAAAAAHH" / What a thing you borrowed!!
4.SummaryEnglish: Pyonkichi watches a mother feeding a baby lovingly. Touched, he asks Hiroshi to treat him nicely as well. / Goro plays shogi with Hiroshi. But Pyonkichi comments from the side, Hiroshi feels as if he's not even playing.

5.TitleEnglish: Pyonkichi's Home Run / Kiss is a Token of Gratittude
5.SummaryEnglish: There is a school baseball game and Hiroshi is jealous of the popular classmate on his team. / Hiroshi sees Goro helping a lady being harrassed and getting a kiss as a token of grattitude.

6.TitleEnglish: My Maria-chan / The Tearful, Great Special Training
6.SummaryEnglish: Gorilla-imo was taking care of a stray-cat that he named Maria. Hiroshi decides to take her home. / Hiroshi spins the shirt with Pyonkichi like a fan. Kyoko gets angry at him, but they are training for the washing machine.

7.TitleEnglish: The Great Teacher - Mr. Machida / Mariya's Strange Habit
7.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi's homeroom teacher Mr. Machida is a great teacher with 25 years of experience. / Hiroshi's cat Maria has a bad habit of taking shoes from other houses.

8.TitleEnglish: Mom, I Want to Eat Sushi!! / Bravo, Miss Yoshiko!
8.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi loves sushi, but he hasn't had any for months! / Ms. Yoshiko who teaches English is a beautiful lady who Hiroshi admires.

9.TitleEnglish: The Duel at the Public Bath House / Oh My Dear Dad!
9.SummaryEnglish: Gorilla-imo loves Hiroshi's cat Maria. But, he is very jealous of Hiroshi as Maria is very attached. / Hiroshi is fired up to find a partner for the still single Ume.

10.TitleEnglish: Darling Girl, She Is / Bravo, Ume-San
10.SummaryEnglish: Kyoko's friend Midori seems to have some interest in Hiroshi as she is seen staring at Hiroshi. / Ume falls in love at first sight with Ms. Yoshiko. He even comes to the school!

11.SummaryEnglish: The last day of the school year, Hiroshi plans something in order to got be scolded for his bad grades, / Kyoko invites Hiroshi to go skating. Hiroshi can't skate at all, but he ends up taking the offer.

12.TitleEnglish: Merry Christmans, Uncle Ume / Don't Cry, Ume
12.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi and Pyonkichi promise Ume to go to the orphanage's Christmas party. / Setsu, a girl Ume treated like a younger sibling at the orphanage, goes to confide in Ume.

13.TitleEnglish: How to Catch a Cold / Sushi for the New Year's Eve
13.SummaryEnglish: Pyonkichi participates in a tournament with Hiroshi, but he catches a cold. / New Year's Eve, everyone's eating soba so there are no customers in Ume's restaurant.

14.TitleEnglish: Wonderful New Year's Gift / Sushi, Kiss, Ski
14.SummaryEnglish: Misako comes crying to Hiroshi and the others. She's lost her New Year's money. / Kyoko and the others go skiing with Mr. Minami's car. Hiroshi misses out on going with them.

15.TitleEnglish: I'll do anything for my Love / The Perfect Combination's Gone A Stray
15.SummaryEnglish: Kyoko's dream is to become a bride. Hearing that, Hiroshi is determined to become an ideal husband. / Hiroshi and Pyonkichi have a huge fight. Hiroshi even wears his shirt backwwards as they don't even want to look at each other.

16.TitleEnglish: Good Bye, Kyoko / Who is the Most Clingy Fellow?
16.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi and Kyoko are now sitting faraway from each other due to the change of seating in class. / Ume comes to sneak a peak at Ms. Yoshiko's class everyday, but Ms. Yoshiko is troubled.

17.TitleEnglish: A Genius in Bowling / Midwinter Swimming Aieee...
17.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi is invited to go bowling with Kyoko, so Hiroshi studies about Bowling to look good in front of others. / Mr. Minami tells the class that they are going swimming in mid-winter, everyone wants to avoid it.

18.TitleEnglish: Daddy / Can't fall in love with me, Teacher
18.SummaryEnglish: A mother and child frog visits town to look for the father. They look at Pyonkichi and think it's him. / Ume learns about Valentine's day and sends Ms. Yoshiko a bunch of chocolate.

20.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi is invited to Kyoko's mother's birthday party. He is shocked to hear she is only 35. / Ume suddenly is bed ridden with a fever. Hiroshi decides to help out with the restaurant,

21.TitleEnglish: A Super Transformation / Boys and Girls
21.SummaryEnglish: Kyoko goes out shopping, and has make up done at the cosmetic's section of the mall. / Gorilla-imo has been giving girls grades" as hey walk by. Everyone is displeased and Hiroshi decides to fight."

22.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Minami plays a prank of dropping a bucket on Hiroshi the day he is late to school and makes Hiroshi angry. / The goldfish Pyonkichi was watching over has been attacked by a cat. Pyonkichi thinks it might be Maria.

23.TitleEnglish: Argh! Flat Frog and Sold Frog / A Wanted Criminal Comes to Town
23.SummaryEnglish: After meeting a travelling frog, Pyonkichi starts to think he is unhappy and wants to return back to normal. / A wanted criminal has run into Hiroshi's town. The man tries to escape by tricking the police to think he's already captured.

25.TitleEnglish: Kiss! Smack Smack! / Gorilla-Imo's Great Transformation
25.SummaryEnglish: Misako who was wearing her mom's lipstick bumps into Hiroshi causing Pyonkichi to get a kiss mark. / Gorilla-imo seemingly has a sudden change of heart and starts acting very proper.

26.SummaryEnglish: Out of instict, Pyonkichi's senses tell him that it's going to Rain despite the clear weather. / Pyonkichi treats a frog shaped piggy bank, that he received as a gift from Kyoko, like a girlfriend.

27.TitleEnglish: Oh! Foolish Frog / Pyonkichi Runs Away from Home
27.SummaryEnglish: Mom asks Pyonkichi to help her by shopping, but when they arrive to the store, it's moved to another city! / Mom made a new sweater for Hiroshi. He loves it so much, he wears it to school but forgets Pyonkichi.

28.TitleEnglish: The Kingdom of Frogs / Blow Away the Cold
28.SummaryEnglish: Pyonkichi meets many frogs at a pond when he goes hiking on a mountain with Hiroshi. / On a cold winter morning, Pyonkichi sees an elderly man jogging a marathon while naked.

29.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi was carrying a prop for his school play in his bag and Pyonkichi is eager to see it. / Hiroshi's cousin from Hokkaido came to visit. He's only 5 years old, but his face looks just like Hiroshi!

30.TitleEnglish: The Gorilla Escaped! / Who's the President of Student Council!?
30.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi and the others hear about a Gorilla having a nervous breakdown when they go to visit the Zoo. / Gorilla-imo volunteers as a candidate for the student council president.

31.TitleEnglish: Pyonkichi takes a Test / Pyonkichi Subdues a Robber
31.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Machida and the class tell Pyonkichi they don't think he's capable of studying. / As the shirt hadn't dried, Pyonkichi was going to be hung up to dry overnight but he gets stolen!

32.TitleEnglish: I Love Babies / Just Because of Eating Ramen
32.SummaryEnglish: Pyonkichi plays with a baby at the park, but it turns out this baby had been abandoned. / Hiroshi and Pyonkichi go into a Ramen Restaurant and eat bowls of ramen, only to find out they've lost their money.

33.TitleEnglish: The Fish Bone / I'm in Love
33.SummaryEnglish: During breakfast, Hiroshi gets a small fish bone stuck in his throat and tries to take it out. / Kyoko falls in love with a young man selling his poem's on the street.

34.TitleEnglish: You Are a Dog / Drive Back Mr. Machida!
34.SummaryEnglish: After seeing hypnosis on TV, Hiroshi thinks to try some hypnotizing as well. / Almost everyday, Hiroshi forgets his homework and is told to stood outside the class.

35.TitleEnglish: Kujira Flies / The Home Run of Oath
35.SummaryEnglish: A large kid named Kujira transfer's to Hiroshi's school and class. / Hiroshi's aquaintance Kenji hasn't been able to walk despite his injury being healed.

36.TitleEnglish: Together in the Rain / Kujira's Tears
36.SummaryEnglish: Pyonkichi's senses the rain is coming, but Hiroshi and Ume see Ms. Yoshiko in a kimono going out doors. / On the way to school, Hiroshi and Gorilla-imo start a fight as usual. But, Kurjira intervenes to mediate the situation.

37.TitleEnglish: Is This a Guy's Way of Life? / Hiroshi, An Adopted Son?
37.SummaryEnglish: On the way to school, Hiroshi and Gorilla-imo start a fight as usual. But, Kurjira intervenes to mediate the situation. / Hiroshi has become a candidate to be adopted into a rich family. Starting Gorilla-imo, he has many rivals.

38.TitleEnglish: Kayoko of Suehiro Sushi / Don't Come to School, Pyonkichi
38.SummaryEnglish: Helping out Ume, Hiroshi is handing a delivery to the sushi restaurant in the neighboring town. / Pyonkichi makes a drawing on the chalkboard of Mr. Minami crying from being rejected by Ms. Yoshiko.

39.TitleEnglish: Wanted a Wife from Takara Sushi / Life Saver is Hard
39.SummaryEnglish: The forever single owner of Takara Sushi is looking for a marriage candidate. / Mr. Minami, who saved a girl who was drowning in the lake, is on the news paper.

40.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi is asked by Mom to deliver a new dress to a regular customer, but he is having trouble on the way. / After seeing a couple at his restaurant, Ume decides to propose to Ms. Minami.

41.SummaryEnglish: On a hot summer day with the blazing sun, a dump truck suddenly crashes into Hiroshi's yard. / Gorilla-imo is helping out the Fish Shop since his mom is bed ridden from a cold.

42.TitleEnglish: Horrible Room of Controle / Summer House of Takara Sushi
42.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Minami was assigned for night duty during summer vacation. Hiroshi and the others head to school to scare him. / Mr. Minami, Ms. Yoshiko, Hiroshi and the others are invited to the summer house of Takara Sushi.

43.SummaryEnglish: The day of the school summer camp is here! Hiroshi and everyone was excited, but due to the budget, the location is a park near by. / A strange mark that looks like a heart suddenly appears on Pyonkichi's face.

44.TitleEnglish: Handsome Looks! / Pyonkichi, Who was aimed at!
44.SummaryEnglish: Kyoko tells Pyonkichi and Hiroshi that she thinks they look wonderful when they are angry. / Pyonkichi suddenly says that he is being targeted for his life. Goro, Kyoko, Ume, and even Hiroshi attack him!

45.TitleEnglish: Let's Get a Bicycle for Quize / Ghost Comes Up When Bell Rings
45.SummaryEnglish: Gorilla-imo wins a bicycle from a quiz competition and ends up in a situation with Kyoko. / Yoshiko has plans to visit and stay with her aunt at the temple. Hearing this, Ume tags along.

46.TitleEnglish: It's a Sin, Kyoko / Rushing Homework
46.SummaryEnglish: Looking at a photo of her parents when they were younger, Kyoko realizes she looks exactly like her mother. / It's the last day of summer vacation, and Hiroshi is fratically trying to finish his homework.

47.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi finds a stone in the empty lot. That stone is the same stone that made Hiroshi trip and fall onto Pyonkichi! / It's the start of the new semester and Mr. Minami sees a drawing making fun of him on the chalkboard already.

48.TitleEnglish: Reveal The Secret of Mr. Minami / Who I Am
48.SummaryEnglish: One night, Hiroshi and the others see Mr. Minami going out and acting suspicious. / While doing a delivery on his bike, Ume is distracted by a couple. He runs right into a car and a pole and loses his memory.

49.TitleEnglish: Hey, Ponkotsu! / Pyon-kichi has a Navel?
49.SummaryEnglish: The black and white TV at Hiroshi's home is broken. But Ponkotsu-taro says he can provide them with a colored TV! / Pyonkichi gets bitten on the stomach by a snapping turtle and ends up with a belly button!

50.TitleEnglish: Nighter Birthday / Kyoko is My Girlfriend!
50.SummaryEnglish: Goro cries that his house is too small and he can't hold a party for this birthday. / Gorilla-imo writes and gives a love letter to Kyoko. Hiroshi loses his mind and requests for a duel.

51.TitleEnglish: Ume's Mother in His Memory / Shinpachi Made His Appearance
51.SummaryEnglish: Looking at some customers at his restaurant, Ume reminices about his mother that he doesn't even know. / A smirky and cool delinquent, Shinpachi has transferred to Hiroshi's class. The teachers are troubled.

52.TitleEnglish: It's Secret to Pyonkichi / Detestable, Shinpachi
52.SummaryEnglish: Without taking Pyonkichi, Hiroshi and Kyoko head to the mall while speaking together in secret. / Gorilla-imo starts a fight with the new kid Shinpachi, but he easily loses to Shinpachi.

53.TitleEnglish: The Present Incident / The Show Down! Ume VS Shinpachi
53.SummaryEnglish: Ume saw Ms. Yoshiko buying a necktie, but the next day, he shockingly sees Mr. Minami wearing the same one! / Ume is at school again in order to see Ms. Yoshiko. During class, he gets in a fight with Shinpachi.

54.SummaryEnglish: It's the night of the festival and Ume wants to impress Ms. Yoshiko. He makes a plan with Hiroshi and the others. / At the festival, Hiroshi sees Kyoko scooping for goldfish. Hiroshi tells her that he's an expert at it and tries to impress her.

55.TitleEnglish: Miss Yoshiko - Bride for a Day / Drunken Affair
55.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Minami tries to impress all his former peers at a reunion, and lies about already getting married and having a child. / Hiroshi goes to buy some Oden at a food stand, but he is disrupted by some drunk people and unable to go homeâ€¦

56.TitleEnglish: Gyaah! Seriously Injured / Boy or Girl? A Baby is Born
56.SummaryEnglish: During PE, Shinpachi spins on the monkey bars. Being competitive, Hiroshi tries as well but he falls off and gets mildly injured. / Kyoko's mother is having a baby! Unable to wait for the baby, Hiroshi sends Pyonkichi to the hospital to report on status.

57.SummaryEnglish: Hanako, a girl in the class next to Hiroshi's, follows Hiroshi around. She seems to have some sort of concernsâ€¦ / Kyoko's little brother Shusaku, was a baby who never laughed. In order to make him laugh, Hiroshi and the others hold and event.

58.TitleEnglish: Messed Up Class Visit / Toilet-Train the Baby
58.SummaryEnglish: Today is the day of the Class Visit. Knowing that he'll be shamed in front of Mom, Hiroshi is not feeling good about it. / Shusaku hates diapers. He always pees himself when he takes it off. Everyone tries to come up with a solution to toilet-train him.

59.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi sees news that there were some gold found, and he wants to find some treasure to get rich as well. / It's the Edo period, the one who saves Okyoko from the yakuza mafia was Gorilla-imo!

60.TitleEnglish: Mr. Minami Returns Home / The Oden Vendor's Fire Scandal
60.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Minami is visiting his home town, Hiroshi and the others came with him. But, for some reason the kids are dressed like rebels. / The old man at the oden food truck seemingly loves to watch fires. The old man hears about a fire and Hiroshi helps.

61.TitleEnglish: Love Letter Mistery / The Great Escape
61.SummaryEnglish: Kyoko recieves a love letter without a sender name. Hiroshi is desperate to know who sent it. / Hiroshi does anything he can to avoid cleaning. Kyoko and classmates are all angry and force him to clean by himself.

62.TitleEnglish: Hiroshi and Kyoko Pair Skates / Who's The Worst of All
62.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi and Kyoko go skating, but Hiroshi is struggling at it so he makes his friend Kanpei find a solution. / Shinpachi makes fun of Hiroshi who only scored 10% on his exam. Hiroshi throws his frusturation on Kyoko, she makes an announcement about him.

63.TitleEnglish: Break Up The Wedding / Ume's Secret on Christmas
63.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Machida was invited to have a speech at his former student's wedding, but the event is about to be canceled since the bride can't participate due to being pregnant. / Ume is invited by Ms. Yoshiko to a Christmas party, but shockingly Ume declines!

64.TitleEnglish: Mochi-Cake Making / Free Sushi on New Year's Eve
64.SummaryEnglish: Ms. Yoshiko invites both Ume and Mr. Minami to make mochi rice cakes during the new years. . Takara Sushi is having a new years all you can eat event, Hiroshi and the others are in line.

65.TitleEnglish: The Flat Frog in Edo Period / He First Dreams of The Year
65.SummaryEnglish: It's the Edo period, Hirodon falls onto a frog and the frog gets stuck on his clothes. / Everyone is having fun talking about their first dreams of the year, but Hiroshi has yet to see his.

66.TitleEnglish: Let's Have No Tests / A Confusing Kiss
66.SummaryEnglish: Ume has appeared in the classroom as usual, but he has ruined the exam. Ms. Yoshiko is very angry! / Kyoko sees Mayumi from Class C with Hiroshi and thinks that they have kissed. Mayumi even lies to Kyoko to push the misunderstanding further.

67.TitleEnglish: Ume with A Sword / Hiroshi is in Trouble
67.SummaryEnglish: Ms. Yoshiko has come to dine at Takara Sushi and Ume is thrilled. But he recieves an order for a delivery and heads out unwillingly. / All of Hiroshi's underwear is in the laundry and without a choice, he goes to school without wearing any underwear.

68.TitleEnglish: A Bride Candidate / Pyonkichi's Great Hostage Rescue Operation
68.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Minami's dad has come to visit, bringing along a marriage candidate. Mr. Minami doesn't want to marry by his dad's command and asks Hiroshi for help. / A burglar has infiltrated the school and takes Ms. Yoshiko and Kyoko hostage!

69.TitleEnglish: Okay! It's Break Wind Time / The Girl Who Fell For Gorilla-Imo
69.SummaryEnglish: Pyonkichi has farted but Hiroshi assumes that it was Kyoko and they have a big argument. / Hanako looks like she wants to say something to Gorilla-imo. Hiroshi thinks she's fallen for him. / Hanako looks like she wants to say something to Gorilla-imo.

70.TitleEnglish: The Beautiful Snow Sculpture / A Public Lottery
70.SummaryEnglish: Kanpei is very good with his hands, he makes a snowman for Kyoko but Hiroshi tries to take credit! / Ume gets a lottery ticket from the baked potato stall and he shockingly wins a hundred million yen!

71.TitleEnglish: Lunch on Sale / Please Give me Your Cold
71.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi has croquette for lunch evertday but he's gotten bored of them. He thinks of trading lunches at school. / Kyoko is sick, Hiroshi and Gorilla-imo have come to visit to see how she is doing.

72.TitleEnglish: A Funny Free Loader / Poor Mr. Minami
72.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi meets a karate master who is able to chop a flying baseball into two! / Mr. Minami goes to the hospital after getting pain in his abdomen and hears that it's nothing serious but Ume overhears otherwise.

73.SummaryEnglish: Everyone is tired of Gorilla-imo's tyranny, so Goro tricks him into playing with other children. / Everyone is playing kick-the-can and Goro's kick of the can hits Hiroshi. Hiroshi strikes back but hits a passing by Gorilla-imo in the face.

74.TitleEnglish: Kanpei, the Genious Cartoonist / The Secret of Shinpachi
74.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi and the others make Kanpei enter the Contest of writing a Comic. / Ume is bothering couples again but Shinpachi passes by with a bad attitude as usual.

75.TitleEnglish: The Family Jar, Big One! / Goro Kindergarten in Nick of Time!
75.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi gets in a big argument with Mom and breaks her important sewing machine. / Gathering all the kids in the neighborhood, Goro and Misako are playing pretend-kindergarten.

76.TitleEnglish: Hiking in Strange Way / Transference of Mr. Machida
76.SummaryEnglish: It's a day for Hiking! Being lead by a kind officer, everyone heads for a shrine near by. / Hiroshi and Gorilla-imo hear that Mr. Machida is going to be transferred to the all-girls Yamayuri Academy.

77.TitleEnglish: Babysitting for Little Shusaku / Duel! Public Bath House!
77.SummaryEnglish: Kyoko tells Hiroshi and Gorilla-imo that she'll go on a date with who ever babysits her baby brother Shusaku. / Ume tries to sneak a peek at the woman's side of the bath house, but Shinpachi's angry mother scolds and embarasses Ume.

78.TitleEnglish: Oh, Miss Sunglasses! / Pyonkichi, 5 Minutes to Explosion!
78.SummaryEnglish: There is a new transfer student, they turn out to be Kuniko who gave Hiroshi his sunglasses when they were smaller! / There is a bus-jacking incident in the neighborhood. Pyonkichi accidetally ends up swallowing the bomb!

79.TitleEnglish: Kuniko, The Match-Maker of Love / Pyonkichi's Great Prediction
79.SummaryEnglish: Gorilla-imo is gifted sunglasses from Kuniko. However, the next day he sees all the boys at school with the same sunglasses! / Ume wins the horse race by following Pyonkichi's advice!

80.TitleEnglish: Mr. Minami is Much Sought After / Hot Relationship
80.SummaryEnglish: Kuniko falls in love with Mr. Minami after he gives her an umbrella on a rainy day. / Kyoko is displeased seeing Kuniko and Hiroshi walking together.

81.TitleEnglish: Biting Fingers One and Twice / Big Operation To Be A Good Son
81.SummaryEnglish: Gorilla-imo lies and says that he got Kyoko to bite his finger. / Seeing Hiroshi begging for an allowance to Mom, Kyoko tells Hiroshi to give more back to surprise her.

82.TitleEnglish: Who Is The School Thief? / Mom's Crazy Dance
82.SummaryEnglish: The music teacher scolds Hiroshi who is always sleeping during class. As punishment, he's told to run in the court yard. / Shinpachi and Hiroshi have a skating race, the loser has to dance the can-can.

83.TitleEnglish: No Exit, Pyonkichi, Hiroshi! / Kuniko's Favorite Recipe
83.SummaryEnglish: Pyonkichi and Hiroshi are trapped in a elevator of a building that is still in construction. / Being told to get home early by Mom, Hiroshi gets home only to see that Mom isn't home so he asks Kuniko if she can cook.

85.TitleEnglish: Elder Lady / Pyonkichi is the Pest
85.SummaryEnglish: Kyoko's baby brother Shusuke isn't very expressive, but receiving a kiss by Ms. Yoshiko he turns bright red. / Hiroshi is told that Pyonkichi is a reincarnation of a demon and that he needs to stay away from him.

86.TitleEnglish: Shinpachi Has a Pyonkichi?! / FIght Caused By Dried Sardine
86.SummaryEnglish: Ms. Yoshiko scolds Shinpachi and his bad attitude, but he shows no sign of remorse. / Pyonkichi runs away from home after having a big fight with Hiroshi.

87.TitleEnglish: My Darling Ume / See You Later Alligator
87.SummaryEnglish: Kuniko falls in love with Ume who drives her on his bike in order to her get to school on time. / The trouble maker from before is back to trouble Hiroshi again.

89.TitleEnglish: Oh, Good Son / Pyonkichi is Active in School Club
89.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi is displeased that his snack is always the same thing so Mom plans something out. / Pyonkichi suddenly says that he wants to join a club so they go watch some club activities.

90.TitleEnglish: A Dream Girl / Ah! Dear School Friend
90.SummaryEnglish: Mom is having an important guest coming over. Hiroshi is shown a picture of the guests and falls in love with the beautiful girl in the photo. / Mr. Machida meets his old friend who is now rich. Hiroshi and the others all go to dinner with them.

91.TitleEnglish: Mr. Minami, Uninvited Visitor / Cold War
91.SummaryEnglish: Losing his paycheck, Mr. Minami is kicked out of his apartment after missing rent payment. / Mom thinks that Kyoko's mom made fun of Hiroshi and they have a big fight.

92.TitleEnglish: Getting Kyoko Back / The Hustling Frog With The Secret Potion
92.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi hears a rumor that Kyoko has a new boyfriend, and is shocked to actually see her walking with a handsome boy! / Pyonkichi gets a heat stroke and is given some medicine from the old man at Takara Sushi.

93.TitleEnglish: Wonderful Summer Vacation / Mom, are you getting married?!
93.SummaryEnglish: Wanting to enjoy his summer vacation without worries, Hiroshi thinks about finishing his homework before the vacation. / A man riding an expensive car comes to visit Mom. Hiroshi witnesses them choosing wedding attire!

94.TitleEnglish: Oh! The Buroran is Hi-jacked / Mr. Ume
94.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Minami's car, the Buroran is hi-jacked by some bank robbers! / Hiroshi and Ume are at the beach with the children from the orphanage.

95.TitleEnglish: Night Duty of Terror / Ume Expect to Detain
95.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi and the others head to school at night dresssed as monsters to scare Mr. Minami. / Ume and the old man get in a fight and Ume leaves home and stays with Hiroshi.

96.SummaryEnglish: Ume goes on a date with Ms. Yoshiko after Mr. Minami has a trip to visit his home town. / Hiroshi wants some extra allowance, so he goes on a search to see if anyone is hiring for pet-sitting.

97.TitleEnglish: Go Go Beer Party! / Lost Pyonkichi
97.SummaryEnglish: Ume is at the Beer Garden and he's very pleased after running into Ms. Yoshiko. / Some ink gets onto the shirt with Pyonkichi, but Hiroshi is frantic after hearing that Pyonkichi might die because of this!

98.TitleEnglish: Haunted Apartment / The Bait For Fishing Is Pyonkichi
98.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Minami is asked to watch an apartment. He is excited to have a young woman move in, but instead came a middle-aged man. / Hiroshi passes by a pond that has rumors of a monster coming out of it.

99.TitleEnglish: Astonishing! Insect Collecting / The Representitive Battle of Goro and Mogura
99.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi is out looking for bugs to do his summer homework. / Hiroshi and Goro are having a duel with Gorilla-imo and Mogura after being tired of their bullying.

100.SummaryEnglish: Pyonkichi becomes a friend with a blind young girl called Sachiko. Pyonkichi is unable to tell Sachiko that he is a flat frog.

101.TitleEnglish: Hiroshi's Secret Weapon / Energy Frog, Pyonkichi
101.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi has no clue about the answers to his exam, so he rolls the dice on his answers, but ends up with a perfect score! / Thunder hits Pyonkichi and he transforms into a Energy frog with super strength.

102.TitleEnglish: Who will be the PTA President? / It's Hard Being "Mr. Hit Me"
102.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi's mom and Gorilla-imo's mom both end up being candidates for the PTA president. / Hiroshi punches someone asking for punches, but they over-react and force Hiroshi to cover the medical bills.

103.TitleEnglish: A Balloon in the Sky / Hilarious Charity Talent Show
103.SummaryEnglish: After seeng a dream about riding a hot air balloon, Hiroshi wants to ride one in real life. / In order to get a birthday cake ready for Pyonkichi, Hiroshi and the others arrange a fake charity talent show.
